<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Acknowledge a claim"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/claim/{claimId}/acknowledge"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Notifies receipt by the donor participant of the claim with `OPEN` status.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
